question: Which bank signed an agreement with SIDBI under which it will act as a preferred financial institution for giving loans to the small and medium enterprising customers?
explanation: Yes Bank has entered into an agreement with SIDBI under which it will act as a preferred financial institution for giving loans to the small and medium enterprising customers. This will facilitate smooth flow of credit in a hassle-free manner to MSME customers availing term loan facility from SIDBI. Small enterprises will also be entitled to use Yes Bank's varied banking solutions.
